because <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5493>didn't<s%> turn aside from anything that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life,<s%> except only in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite.<s%>

But the high <S%H1116>places<s%> were not taken <S%H5493>away:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> was <S%H8003>perfect<s%> with <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all his <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
